mapper.update: update client set client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_sex = #{clientSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_password = #{clientPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_phone = #{clientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_birthday = #{clientBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, client_site = #{clientSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_remark = #{clientRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select client_id, client_name, client_sex, user_id, client_password, client_phone, client_birthday, client_site, client_remark from client where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select client_id, client_name, client_sex, user_id, client_password, client_phone, client_birthday, client_site, client_remark from client
